title: ATC exceeds MC, must be rising wth more output

content.question: Which of the following must be true if at the tenth unit of output, marginal cost (<math alttext="M C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>MC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) is <math alttext="$130" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>130</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and average total cost (<math alttext="A T C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) is <math alttext="$150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>150</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="A T C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of producing the ninth unit is higher than <math alttext="$150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>150</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="A T C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of producing the ninth unit is less than <math alttext="$150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>150</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="M C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>MC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of producing the ninth unit is higher than <math alttext="$130" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>130</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The average variable cost of producing the tenth unit is higher than <math alttext="$150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>150</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.
The average variable cost of producing the tenth unit is equal to <math alttext="$20" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>20</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="A T C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>ATC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of producing the ninth unit is higher than <math alttext="$150" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>$</mi><mn>150</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
